verses.text_plain: And he entered again into the synagogue; and there was a man there which had a withered hand.
verses.verse_html: 1And he entered again into the synagogue; and there was a man there which had a withered hand.

verses.text_plain: And they watched him, whether he would heal him on the sabbath day; that they might accuse him.
verses.verse_html: 2And they watched him, whether he would heal him on the sabbath day; that they might accuse him.

verses.text_plain: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand, Stand forth.
verses.verse_html: 3And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand, Stand forth.

verses.text_plain: And he saith unto them, Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days, or to do evil? to save life, or to kill? But they held their peace.
verses.verse_html: 4And he saith unto them, Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days, or to do evil? to save life, or to kill? But they held their peace.

verses.text_plain: And when he had looked round about on them with anger, being grieved for the hardness of their hearts, he saith unto the man, Stretch forth thine hand. And he stretched it out: and his hand was restored whole as the other.
verses.verse_html: 5And when he had looked round about on them with anger, being grieved for the hardness of their hearts, he saith unto the man, Stretch forth thine hand. And he stretched it out: and his hand was restored whole as the other.

tokens.text: when he had looked round about

verses.text_plain: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
verses.verse_html: 6And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.

verses.text_plain: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea: and a great multitude from Galilee followed him, and from Judea,
verses.verse_html: 7But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea: and a great multitude from Galilee followed him, and from Judea,

verses.text_plain: And from Jerusalem, and from Idumea, and from beyond Jordan; and they about Tyre and Sidon, a great multitude, when they had heard what great things he did, came unto him.
verses.verse_html: 8And from Jerusalem, and from Idumea, and from beyond Jordan; and they about Tyre and Sidon, a great multitude, when they had heard what great things he did, came unto him.

verses.text_plain: And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.
verses.verse_html: 9And he spake to his disciples, that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude, lest they should throng him.

verses.text_plain: For he had healed many; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him, as many as had plagues.
verses.verse_html: 10For he had healed many; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him, as many as had plagues.

verses.text_plain: And unclean spirits, when they saw him, fell down before him, and cried, saying, Thou art the Son of God.
verses.verse_html: 11And unclean spirits, when they saw him, fell down before him, and cried, saying, Thou art the Son of God.

verses.text_plain: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known.
verses.verse_html: 12And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known.

verses.text_plain: And he goeth up into a mountain, and calleth unto him whom he would: and they came unto him.
verses.verse_html: 13And he goeth up into a mountain, and calleth unto him whom he would: and they came unto him.

verses.text_plain: And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,
verses.verse_html: 14And he ordained twelve, that they should be with him, and that he might send them forth to preach,

verses.text_plain: And to have power to heal sicknesses, and to cast out devils:
verses.verse_html: 15And to have power to heal sicknesses, and to cast out devils:

verses.text_plain: And Simon he surnamed Peter;
verses.verse_html: 16And Simon he surnamed Peter;

verses.text_plain: And James the son of Zebedee, and John the brother of James; and he surnamed them Boanerges, which is, The sons of thunder:
verses.verse_html: 17And James the son of Zebedee, and John the brother of James; and he surnamed them Boanerges, which is, The sons of thunder:

verses.text_plain: And Andrew, and Philip, and Bartholomew, and Matthew, and Thomas, and James the son of Alpheus, and Thaddeus, and Simon the Canaanite,
verses.verse_html: 18And Andrew, and Philip, and Bartholomew, and Matthew, and Thomas, and James the son of Alpheus, and Thaddeus, and Simon the Canaanite,

verses.text_plain: And Judas Iscariot, which also betrayed him: and they went into an house.
verses.verse_html: 19And Judas Iscariot, which also betrayed him: and they went into an house.

verses.text_plain: And the multitude cometh together again, so that they could not so much as eat bread.
verses.verse_html: 20And the multitude cometh together again, so that they could not so much as eat bread.

verses.text_plain: And when his friends heard of it, they went out to lay hold on him: for they said, He is beside himself.
verses.verse_html: 21And when his friends heard of it, they went out to lay hold on him: for they said, He is beside himself.

verses.text_plain: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said, He hath Beelzebub, and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils.
verses.verse_html: 22And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said, He hath Beelzebub, and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils.

verses.text_plain: And he called them unto him, and said unto them in parables, How can Satan cast out Satan?
verses.verse_html: 23And he called them unto him, and said unto them in parables, How can Satan cast out Satan?

verses.text_plain: And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.
verses.verse_html: 24And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.

verses.text_plain: And if a house be divided against itself, that house cannot stand.
verses.verse_html: 25And if a house be divided against itself, that house cannot stand.

verses.text_plain: And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.
verses.verse_html: 26And if Satan rise up against himself, and be divided, he cannot stand, but hath an end.

verses.text_plain: No man can enter into a strong man’s house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
verses.verse_html: 27No man can enter into a strong man’s house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.

verses.text_plain: Verily I say unto you, All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men, and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme:
verses.verse_html: 28Verily I say unto you, All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men, and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme:

verses.text_plain: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation:
verses.verse_html: 29But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness, but is in danger of eternal damnation:

tokens.strong_raw: G3756 G1519 G3588 G0165H lemma.TR:ουκ lemma.TR:εις lemma.TR:τον lemma.TR:αιωνα

verses.text_plain: Because they said, He hath an unclean spirit.
verses.verse_html: 30Because they said, He hath an unclean spirit.

verses.text_plain: There came then his brethren and his mother, and, standing without, sent unto him, calling him.
verses.verse_html: 31There came then his brethren and his mother, and, standing without, sent unto him, calling him.

verses.text_plain: And the multitude sat about him, and they said unto him, Behold, thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee.
verses.verse_html: 32And the multitude sat about him, and they said unto him, Behold, thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee.

verses.text_plain: And he answered them, saying, Who is my mother, or my brethren?
verses.verse_html: 33And he answered them, saying, Who is my mother, or my brethren?

verses.text_plain: And he looked round about on them which sat about him, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren!
verses.verse_html: 34And he looked round about on them which sat about him, and said, Behold my mother and my brethren!

verses.text_plain: For whosoever shall do the will of God, the same is my brother, and my sister, and mother.
verses.verse_html: 35For whosoever shall do the will of God, the same is my brother, and my sister, and mother.
